#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int t,s,l;
	string a;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a;
		s=0;
		l=a.length();
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			s+=a[i];
		}
		printf("%c\n",s/l);
	}
	return 0;
}
